title: Bug 124599 - Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table column.
description: Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table column.
OB: When using the keyboard shortcut delete in the second table's second column, the behavior is different compared to using the delete option from the menu.
EB: The behavior of deleting a column using the keyboard shortcut and the menu option should be consistent. Users should experience the same result regardless of the method used to delete the column.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached file in bug 124598.
2. In the file, locate the second table with a list/grid nested in its group header and a merge in the group header row.
3. Select the second column.
4. Press the delete key on your keyboard.
